Name: She turned me into a newt!
About the game: Your peaceful and ever-flourishing realm faces a new disturbance. An evil necromantress roams the land seeking out new victims for her nefarious practices. As luck has it, you've been in the wrong place at the wrong time and she turns you into... yes... you guessed it right. A NEWT! And you haven't gotten any better ever since. In order to regain your former self, you'll need to scrounge for magical components and find the proper person who can actually get rid you of your uncomfortable newtish shape. You'll have to use your wits, outsmart people and search the width and breadth of the realm for those precious ingredients. Some people are not as helpful as you might expect. Try figuring out what they need in order to advance. Supported Aspect Ratios: 16:10, 16:9
